000006  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_AHBPeriphClockCmd
;;;22     	RCC_APB2PeriphClockCmd(RCC_APB2Periph_ADC1 | RCC_APB2Periph_GPIOA, ENABLE);

;;;23     	RCC_ADCCLKConfig(RCC_PCLK2_Div6);

;;;26       GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_AIN;

                  ADC1_Mode_Config PROC
;;;30     
;;;31     static void ADC1_Mode_Config(void)
000000  b500              PUSH     {lr}
;;;32     {
000002  b091              SUB      sp,sp,#0x44
;;;33     	DMA_InitTypeDef DMA_InitStructure;
;;;34     	ADC_InitTypeDef ADC_InitStructure;
;;;35     
;;;36     	/* DMA channel1 configuration */
;;;37       DMA_DeInit(DMA1_Channel1);
000004  4833              LDR      r0,|L3.212|
000006  f7fffffe          BL       DMA_DeInit
;;;38       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_PeripheralBaseAddr = ADC1_DR_Address;    //DMA外设基地址
00000a  4833              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
00000c  9006              STR      r0,[sp,#0x18]
;;;39       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_MemoryBaseAddr = (u32)&ADC_ConvertedValue;  //DMA内存基地址
00000e  4833              LDR      r0,|L3.220|
000010  9007              STR      r0,[sp,#0x1c]
;;;40       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_DIR = DMA_DIR_PeripheralSRC;      //数据传输方向，从外设发送到内存
000012  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000014  9008              STR      r0,[sp,#0x20]
;;;41       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_BufferSize = 1;
000016  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000018  9009              STR      r0,[sp,#0x24]
;;;42       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_PeripheralInc = DMA_PeripheralInc_Disable;   //外设地址寄存器不变
00001a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00001c  900a              STR      r0,[sp,#0x28]
;;;43       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_MemoryInc = DMA_MemoryInc_Enable;            //内存地址寄存器递增
00001e  2080              MOVS     r0,#0x80
000020  900b              STR      r0,[sp,#0x2c]
;;;44       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_PeripheralDataSize = DMA_PeripheralDataSize_HalfWord;

;;;45       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_MemoryDataSize = DMA_MemoryDataSize_HalfWord;

000028  900d              STR      r0,[sp,#0x34]
;;;46       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_Mode = DMA_Mode_Circular;   //工作在循环缓存模式
00002a  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20

;;;47       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_Priority = DMA_Priority_High;
00002e  0200              LSLS     r0,r0,#8
000030  900f              STR      r0,[sp,#0x3c]
;;;48       DMA_InitStructure.DMA_M2M = DMA_M2M_Disable;
000032  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000034  9010              STR      r0,[sp,#0x40]
;;;49       DMA_Init(DMA1_Channel1, &DMA_InitStructure);
000036  a906              ADD      r1,sp,#0x18
000038  4826              LDR      r0,|L3.212|
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       DMA_Init
;;;50       
;;;51       /* Enable DMA channel1 */
;;;52       DMA_Cmd(DMA1_Channel1, ENABLE);
00003e  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000040  4824              LDR      r0,|L3.212|
000042  f7fffffe          BL       DMA_Cmd
;;;53          
;;;54       /* ADC1 configuration */
;;;55       ADC_InitStructure.ADC_Mode = ADC_Mode_Independent;	//独立模式 每个ADC独立工作
000046  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000048  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;56       ADC_InitStructure.ADC_ScanConvMode = ENABLE;				 //使用扫描模式  scan位设置
00004a  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
00004c  f88d0008          STRB     r0,[sp,#8]
;;;57       ADC_InitStructure.ADC_ContinuousConvMode = ENABLE;	// cont位设置 连续转换模式
000050  f88d0009          STRB     r0,[sp,#9]
;;;58       ADC_InitStructure.ADC_ExternalTrigConv = ADC_ExternalTrigConv_None;	;//EXTSEL 选择启动规则通道组转换的外部事件 设置成有软件控制
000054  f44f2060          MOV      r0,#0xe0000
000058  9003              STR      r0,[sp,#0xc]
;;;59       ADC_InitStructure.ADC_DataAlign = ADC_DataAlign_Right;	//数据对齐 由软件置位和清楚   这里设置成右对齐
00005a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00005c  9004              STR      r0,[sp,#0x10]
;;;60       ADC_InitStructure.ADC_NbrOfChannel = 1;		//规则通道序列长度 这些位由软件定义在规则通道转换序列中的通道数目 1个转换 指定由多少个通道被转换
00005e  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000060  f88d0014          STRB     r0,[sp,#0x14]
;;;61       ADC_Init(ADC1, &ADC_InitStructure);
000064  a901              ADD      r1,sp,#4
000066  481c              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
000068  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
00006a  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_Init
;;;62     
;;;63       /* ADC1 regular channel11 configuration */ 
;;;64     	ADC_RegularChannelConfig(ADC1, ADC_Channel_4, 1, ADC_SampleTime_55Cycles5);	//转换时间是55.5个周期
00006e  2305              MOVS     r3,#5
000070  2201              MOVS     r2,#1

000074  4818              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
000076  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
000078  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_RegularChannelConfig
;;;65     
;;;66     
;;;67       /* Enable ADC1 external trigger */
;;;68       ADC_ExternalTrigConvCmd(ADC1, DISABLE);
00007c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00007e  4816              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
000080  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
000082  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_ExternalTrigConvCmd
;;;69     
;;;70       /* Enable ADC1 DMA */
;;;71       ADC_DMACmd(ADC1, ENABLE);
000086  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000088  4813              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
00008a  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
00008c  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_DMACmd
;;;72       
;;;73       /* Enable ADC1 */
;;;74       ADC_Cmd(ADC1, ENABLE);
000090  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000092  4811              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
000094  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
000096  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_Cmd
;;;75     
;;;76       /* Enable ADC1 reset calibaration register */   
;;;77       ADC_ResetCalibration(ADC1);
00009a  480f              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
00009c  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
00009e  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_ResetCalibration
;;;78       /* Check the end of ADC1 reset calibration register */
;;;79       while(ADC_GetResetCalibrationStatus(ADC1));
0000a2  bf00              NOP      
                  |L3.164|
0000a4  480c              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
0000a6  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
0000a8  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_GetResetCalibrationStatus
0000ac  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0000ae  d1f9              BNE      |L3.164|
;;;80     
;;;81       /* Start ADC1 calibaration */
;;;82       ADC_StartCalibration(ADC1);
0000b0  4809              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
0000b2  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
0000b4  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_StartCalibration
;;;83       /* Check the end of ADC1 calibration */
;;;84       while(ADC_GetCalibrationStatus(ADC1));
0000b8  bf00              NOP      
                  |L3.186|
0000ba  4807              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
0000bc  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
0000be  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_GetCalibrationStatus
0000c2  2800              CMP      r0,#0
0000c4  d1f9              BNE      |L3.186|
;;;85          
;;;86       /* Start ADC1 Software Conversion */ 
;;;87       ADC_SoftwareStartConvCmd(ADC1, ENABLE);
0000c6  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
0000c8  4803              LDR      r0,|L3.216|
0000ca  384c              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x4c
0000cc  f7fffffe          BL       ADC_SoftwareStartConvCmd
;;;88     }
0000d0  b011              ADD      sp,sp,#0x44
0000d2  bd00              POP      {pc}
;;;89     
                          ENDP

                  |L3.212|
                          DCD      0x40020008
                  |L3.216|
